attributes.action: substantial increase to the higher rate income tax band (40%), ie earnings over £100,000 per annum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As peoples earnings each year increase, more and more people are likely to start paying tax in the 40% bracket.  This bracket needs to increase so only the very high earners have to pay 40% tax, as what it should be there for.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
